tags: Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
full_summary:
## Tender Notice

### Solicitation Number: S4680568

#### English: Department of National Defense, Temporary Help Services Requirement

#### French: Ministère de la Défense Nationale, Besoin en services d’aide temporaire

The Department of National Defense (DND) has a requirement for Temporary Help Services. This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement (SA) holders under contract EN578-172870 who qualified under the stream and category: Special advisor.

#### Tender Notice Details
| **Key** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Number** | S4680568 |
| **Title** | Temporary Help Services Requirement |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Supply Arrangement |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Selective Tendering |
| **Security Level** | Secret |
| **Publication Date** | 2023-12-20 |
| **Closing Date** | 2023-12-28 (13:30:00) |
| **Regions of Opportunity** | National Capital Region (NCR) |
| **Contracting Entity** | Department of National Defense |

#### Invitation to Proposal:
A list of Supply Arrangement holders has been invited to submit a proposal, including:

* ACOSYS CONSULTING SERVICES INC./ SERVICES CONSEILS ACOSYS INC.
* Adecco Employment Services Limited/Services de placement Adecco Limited
... and 12 other companies in joint ventures or as single entities

#### Access to Tender Documents:

The Request for Proposal is available for download at the following links:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27876/s4680568-rfp-competitive-method-1-right-fit.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27876/s4680568-dp-methode-concurrentielle-1---choix-selectif.pdf

#### Contact Information:

For any inquiries or questions regarding this tender, please contact CFSG(O-G) Temp Help at:

* Phone: (613) 971-7955
* Email: CFSGO-GTemporaryHelp-GSFCO-Gdaidetemporaire@forces.gc.ca

Note: The word limit was met by removing the following redundant information:

- The list of end user entities is not provided.
- Remove all instances of 'Informations Consultées Actualisées ("
